item.title: +Video on Shoes Policeman
item.dc:creator: ashbb
item.content:encoded:
_why said that there would be a lot of work for video support with Ruby 1.9. So, I've never tried to build Shoes Policeman with VIDEO option. But,.... really surprised! It works!! :-D

If you have a Windows PC, download and install the latest Shoes and play built-in sample, simple-video.rb

You can play all built-in samples from manual page by just one click. ;-)

Cheers,
ashbb
